item.description:
Please RSVP!

This meeting will be at MIT!!!! NOT in Waltham. It will start at 7pm, not 6pm.


IBD has started to help us out with a curriculum. This meeting will be focused on their first lesson: How to Spot Market Tops.


If you haven't been to an IBD meetup in a while, this would be a good one to try. Many of you have expressed that you would attend it they were at MIT. We are experimenting with that this meeting.

Here is a PDF file of the first lesson from our friends at IBD: How to Spot Market Tops

Who We Are

This IBD Method is for people who are currently learning and applying IBD tools and the CANSLIM Method to their investing.

Only those seeking to learn the IBD CANSLIM Method should attend.

group.name: Boston Investor's Business Daily Meetup Group

item.name: IBD CANSLIM Meeting
